title: New morde is the best designed champion riot has ever made
body:
His ult makes it almost impossible for your teammates to fuck you over. I want more champions like him where you can ult and take your team out the equation that way trolls have less influence over the game. Someone trolling? No problem! 
Step 1: pick morde
Step 2: ult their carry
Step 3: kill them because your morde the king of 1v1s
Step 4; come back to the fight with more stats and 1v5

I cannot stress how good this feels to not have your team fuck you over. All hail new morde, riots best work yet.

So far, on pbe mordekaiser is to simply put it, broken.
His kit is supposed to make him high health ap juggernaut with little ap (protobelt,liandrys,rylais) on his main build. His scaling however should not be so high not on his q or e but on his passive damage. How can that be changed? Make his passive do less damage when many enemies are hit by it so that his 1v1 power is not reduced but he can not 1v1 in a wave of minions and just deal full dmg and because of the minions targeting him, shielding himself, making the 1v1 impossible (something like garen E).
Nah, it's a typical sucky rework that just looks "good" to the masses

Current Mordekaiser is very rewarding to learn, but most people have just played a couple of games and inted a bunch. From the outside he looks like a very easy champion but with time spent on him, he is amazing. I got my MMR to d4/d3 in a matter of 30 games on him so far this season.

I have played new Morde on PBE and have 3 complaints about his design.

Ultimate:
Being able to take a jungle champion out of an objective fight for 7 seconds is kinda busted.

Ghosts:
Ghosts being removed completely takes away from Mordekaiser's old identity. Riot has really failed us here.

W:
This ability almost doesn't feel like an ability currently, the values are so weak. It feels like the W belongs on the passive and the passive belongs on the W.

Overall he feels like every other juggernaut/fighter in the game now, but with a niche ult, instead of the **unique drain mage** he was. Riot has been shoeing champions into a classification like juggernaut/marksman/enchanter and removing the uniqueness of their play style for quite some time now..

Overall, he looks cool; but pretty disappointed with the game play. A lot of the uniqueness is gone.
